channel.title: Npcs

item.title: Npcs
item.dc:creator: @irlegitir irlegitir
item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

[code]/NPC Talking/
public void UpdateNPCChat() {
/sendFrame126("", 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126("", 4904);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame126("", 4906);/
sendFrame126("", 976);
switch (NpcDialogue) {
case 1:
talk(“Text.”, 454);
break;

		 case 2:	
			talk("Text.", 649);
			break;

}

}[/code]

When I use this when you talk to the first npc, 454 and click “click here to continue” it shows the "649"s npc talk also, anyone know the problem? I’m using American Rune.
Thanks.

Read full topic
